data.name: RTK13 - Original Officer “Koji Kikkawa” オリジナル武将DLC「吉川晃司」
data.detailed_description:
A limited bonus for those who purchased the "RTK13" theme song "Dance To The Future."
Players will be able to introduce into their game Koji Kikkawa officer graphics and accompanying data, specially drawn for this purpose as an original officer.

▼To Use
Select a scenario in the "MAIN MODE" using "SELECT SCENARIO." Under "MANAGE ORIGINAL OFFICERS" select Koji Kikkawa from "ALLOW ORIGINAL OFFICERS TO APPEAR."
Following this, you will be able to use this character in the MAIN MODE.
data.about_the_game:
A limited bonus for those who purchased the "RTK13" theme song "Dance To The Future."
Players will be able to introduce into their game Koji Kikkawa officer graphics and accompanying data, specially drawn for this purpose as an original officer.

▼To Use
Select a scenario in the "MAIN MODE" using "SELECT SCENARIO." Under "MANAGE ORIGINAL OFFICERS" select Koji Kikkawa from "ALLOW ORIGINAL OFFICERS TO APPEAR."
Following this, you will be able to use this character in the MAIN MODE.
data.short_description: Officer data and graphics for Koji Kikkawa will be added. This is a bonus limited to those who purchased the "RTK13" theme song "Dance To The Future.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
